H0.text: who was king after leonidas died. Pausanias

H1.text: who was king after leonidas died. Agesilaus II

H2.text: who was king after leonidas died. Demaratus

H3.text: who was king after leonidas died. Pleistarchus

A4.text: Pleistarchus was the Agiad King of Sparta from 480 to 458 BC

A5.text: Pleistarchus' father King Leonidas perished in 480 BC at the Battle of Thermopylae
